Protocols/Configurable.html#/includesIFA.name: includesIFA
Protocols/Configurable.html#/includesIFA.abstract: Indicates whether or not the library will attach IFA to outgoing requests.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: upc
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The UPC (Universal Product Code) of the product.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: categories
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: A flat array of the names of the categories to which the product belongs.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: currency
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The ISO-4217 currency code in which the product’s value is reported.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: value
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The value of the order. Includes any discounts, if applicable. Example: 1234 for $12.34.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: attributes
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: Any additional attributes to be included with the product.

Protocols/Activity.html#/productViewed(_.name: productViewed(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/productViewed(_.abstract: Report that the user has viewed a product.

Protocols/Activity.html#/productAddedToC.name: productAddedToCart(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/productAddedToC.abstract: Report that the user added a product to their cart.

Protocols/Activity.html#/cartViewed(_:).name: cartViewed(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/cartViewed(_:).abstract: Report that the user viewed their cart.

Protocols/Activity.html.name: Activity
Protocols/Activity.html.abstract: A protocol through which user activities can be reported.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html.name: ButtonProductCompatible
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html.abstract: A protocol that defines the product properties that may be provided when reporting user activity.

Protocols/Configurable.html.name: Configurable
Protocols/Configurable.html.abstract: An interface through which library features can be enabled/disabled.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/quantity.name: quantity
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/quantity.abstract: The number of unique units represented by this line item (default is 1).

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/sku.name: sku
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/sku.abstract: The Stock Keeping Unit of the line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/upc.name: upc
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/upc.abstract: The Universal Product Code of the line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/attributes.name: attributes
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/attributes.abstract: A key/value store for strings to specify additional information about a line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/init(id:tot.name: init(id:total:)
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/init(id:tot.abstract: An array of the line item details that comprise the order

Classes/Order/Customer.html#/email.name: email
Classes/Order/Customer.html#/email.abstract: The SHA-256 hash of the transacting customerâ€™s lowercase email, as a 64-character hex string.

Classes/Order/Customer.html#/isNew.name: isNew
Classes/Order/Customer.html#/isNew.abstract: A flag indicating whether the customer is new (or not).

Classes/Order/Customer.html#/init(id:).name: init(id:)
Classes/Order/Customer.html#/init(id:).abstract: Initializes a customer object with the passed parameters.

Classes/Order.html#/init(id:purchaseDate.name: init(id:purchaseDate:lineItems:)
Classes/Order.html#/init(id:purchaseDate.abstract: Initializes an order object with the passed parameters.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html.name: LineItem
Classes/Order/LineItem.html.abstract: Represents a line item in the order.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/attribution.name: attributionToken
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/attribution.abstract: The last tracked attributionToken from an inbound Button attributed URL.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/trackIncomi.name: trackIncomingURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/trackIncomi.abstract: Checks the passed URL for a Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/trackIncomi.name: trackIncomingUserActivity(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/trackIncomi.abstract: Checks the URL in the passed NSUserActivity for a Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/handlePostI.name: handlePostInstallURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/handlePostI.abstract: Checks to see if the user visited a url prior to installing your app.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/clearAllDat.name: clearAllData()
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/clearAllDat.abstract: Discards the current session and all persisted data.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/features.name: features
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/features.abstract: An interface through which library features can be enabled/disabled.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/activity.name: activity
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/activity.abstract: An interface through which user activity can be reported.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html.name: ButtonMerchant
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html.abstract: ButtonMerchant is the main entry point to the library.

Classes/ButtonProduct.html.name: ButtonProduct
Classes/ButtonProduct.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of the ButtonProductCompatible protocol.

Classes/Order.html.name: Order
Classes/Order.html.abstract: Represents an order placed by the user to be reported using ButtonMerchant.reportOrder(order).
